scripts.build: npm run generate-imported-component && rimraf dist && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: rimraf generated/client.manifest.json && cross-env BABEL_ENV=client parcel build --no-source-maps -d dist/client --public-url /assets client/index.js && move-cli dist/client/parcel-manifest.json generated/client.manifest.json && move-cli dist/client/report.html dist/client-report.html
scripts.build:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=server parcel build --no-source-maps -d dist/server --target node server/index.js && rimraf dist/server/parcel-manifest.json && move-cli dist/server/report.html dist/server-report.html
